document_data.name: Valor's_Call
document_data.mainbody: '''Valor's Call''' was an adventuring party composed of [[good]]-aligned beings, who committed themselves to hunting down and destroying evil wherever it may be.
document_data.Organization: Valors Call was founded and led by Strongheart, a resolute human paladin. He alone decided who was permitted to join and as such was always keeping an eye out for brave heroes.
